Decided to check the finished raws and bruh, somehow she does a sudden 180 and chooses the sensei, also after he wakes up from the dream it shows a marriage invitation. The wedding is happening, the dream is simply him having nightmares because he can't accept she got stolen from him. Also, the sensei seems to keep sending him videos of them fucking which breaks the dude apparently, but like, isn't she a minor? MC could simply use the videos as evidence, but it's an NTR, NTR MCs almost never use their brains.

@lemmings also on the last pages where he wakes up wondering if it's all a dream, were also shown a wedding invitation letter where you should respond if your going to be attending or be abscent so pretty sure it's all real just that with everything happening he's started going into denial about it all... But yeah since the first few pages are him having a dream of being cucked it raises questions but I believe the wedding invitation makes it all clear. On a side note I honestly have no idea how the sensei has "supossedly" trained her into loving him since all were shown is him sexing her while being a bit rough and nasty in how he treats her so it's none of that he has a huge dick or "broke" her or something, it's just you've been cucked for no reason so deal with it...

@Lemmings like usual it's NTR blackmail sensei catches her masturbating on the desk of the guy she likes blackmails her into sex. Then he keeps on using the blackmail cause not like she can just report him and get him fired from his workplace and face criminal charges no her naked body is more important they also can't just beat him down and take the phone...But yeah the story is pretty much ch 1 sensei get's blackmail and forces her to be sex slave, ch 2 here guy she likes finds out and still wants her, ch 3 sensei keeps forcing her into sex while the guy tries to have sex with her as well to like him then sensei goes I deleted the blackmail material so who do you really want? Ch 4-5 girl ends up with sensei and eventually marries him while still hanging out with the guy while sensei sends the guy videos of them havign sex.
